_xResult.title: Sova Linen Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made natural linen top with long sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
We're in love with the grey linen of the pictured top but the Sova top comes in 31 different colors! Perfect to wear casually over jeans or more formally over a matching linen maxi skirt, the Sova top is as versatile as it is classy.

 

The medium weight fabric of this top has already been washed and softened, so you don't have to worry about shrinkage after your first wash. Other features include a boat neckline, 2/3 length sleeves, small side slits, and a standard length of 25" (64cm).

 

Shantima uses only Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. Please choose from the color palette in the last picture and provide your color preference information, as well as your desired length (if you want something different) during checkout.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents.Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
